guide.introduction: Kevin is a very autonomous little junkbot. He runs around the floor madly while lighting up. I have made some instructions on how to make him so you can make him too.:)
guide.introduction_rendered:
Kevin is a very autonomous little junkbot. He runs around the floor madly while lighting up. I have made some instructions on how to make him so you can make him too.:)

Relevant parts
  • 2 1.5v motors, soft wire, hard wire, 9v battery holder, zip tie, 9v battery.
Tools
  • soldering iron and hot glue gun

parts.text: 2 1.5v motors, soft wire, hard wire, 9v battery holder, zip tie, 9v battery.

lines.text: Here are the parts you need (not including the 9V battery).

lines.text: First hot glue the two motors together as shown.
lines.text_raw: First hot glue the two motors together as shown.

lines.text: Solder the soft wire to the motors as shown.
lines.text_raw: Solder the soft wire to the motors as shown.

lines.text: Solder the "+" and "-" leads of the battery case to the motors.
lines.text_raw: Solder the "+" and "-" leads of the battery case to the motors.

lines.text: Next hot-glue the battery holder to the two motors.
lines.text_raw: Next hot-glue the battery holder to the two motors.

lines.text: Now zip tie the wires together and hot-glue the pieces of stiff wire onto both sides of the motor assembly as shown.
lines.text_raw: Now zip tie the wires together and hot-glue the pieces of stiff wire onto both sides of the motor assembly as shown.

lines.text: Put a 9V battery on the battery holder and watch Kevin whiz around the floor.
